QuestData.Title: Insurrection
QuestData.Description: The weapons the Horde has supplied us with will be more than enough. The four of us should split up and arm as many Dragonmaw workers and merchants as we can.$B$BDon't underestimate us, $n. You'll find even our tradesmen are ferocious in battle.$B$BLet's do as much damage as possible. Arm a squad of Dragonmaw and lay waste to the fel enforcers and warlocks that have intimidated my people for so long. Then meet back here to launch our final strike!
QuestData.LogDescription: Arm 3 Dragonmaw Workers or Merchants, then slay 10 Dragonmaw Enforcers and 4 Dragonmaw Warlocks.
QuestData.CompletionText: Revolution, at last!$B$BThe Dragonmaw are finally undoing the shackles of the filth who have held us back!
QuestData.RewardText: We've lost a lot of good orcs, but the fight is going our way, $n.$B$BMor'ghor's regime is collapsing. All that remains is to destroy the beast himself.
